name: BeatRoot (ChairGame)
description:
BeatRoot got bullied by his root neighbour, so he uproot himself and start punching along the beats!

At the 7th beat, you will drain nutrients from the tile to attack. Enemies will also move and shoot towards you.


You can move around freely unlike the enemies, survive and attack enemies to score points!


Each tile will grants him different attacks.

Vertical, Horizontal, Circle punch, You name it!

 

  

 

Drained tiles will regrow in a few seconds.


Good luck, and don't get beaten!

Earth : Art/UI

Cher : Art/UI

Ceck : Programmer/Technical Art
